title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.8 - Final review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9500.8 - Final review

State Regulations

If the commission does issue such an order, it shall, within
such 60-day period: (a) further review
the project; (b) hold one or more
public hearings, one of which shall be near the project site; or
(c) report its findings to the project
sponsor, to any public agency having the power of review or approval of such
project, and to the public through appropriate and available news and
communication media. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9500.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
